name: Onslaught
description: Strike at an enemy with a vicious blow, dealing 3485 Physical Damage to them and all nearby enemies.  This attack ignores the target's Resistance and grants you Physical and Spell Penetration for your Direct Damage attacks equal to 100% of the amount ignored from the initial target for 5 seconds.
effectLines: Now grants Penetration for your Direct Damage attacks rather than Resistances, but for a shorter duration.
coefDescription: Strike at an enemy with a vicious blow, dealing $1 Physical Damage to them and all nearby enemies.  This attack ignores the target's Resistance and grants you Physical and Spell Penetration for your Direct Damage attacks equal to 100% of the amount ignored from the initial target for 5 seconds.
rawDescription:
Strike at an enemy with a vicious blow, dealing <<1>> to them and all nearby enemies.
